text:
Created attachment 35678
Pic with bug

Steps:
1) Open functional helper
2) Choose a function: __timeShift
3) Format string for DateTimeFormatter - to set value YYYY-MM-dd
4) Date to shift (optional)- to set value 2011-01-13
5) Amount of seconds/minutes/hours/days to add - to set value -P5D
Actual result:
The current date has shifted (2018-01-13->2018-01-08)
Expected result:
The Date to shift from 4 step has shifted
creator: antohakiselev@yandex.ru
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
